verbs.description: sinéad o'connor converts to [V: islam] irish singer sinéad o'connor has announced she has converted to islam the artist who is best known for her 1990 hit version of the song nothing compares 2 u said she had changed her name to shuhada in a message on twitter she thanked fellow muslims for their support sinéad o'connor twitter sinéad oconnor shuhada islam
